languages.text: Лишенная цели и предводителя, банда Несущие Слово отступила в глубины Имматериума. Их последним актом мести стал кровавый налет на Футфол. Население нескольких астероидов было истреблено или угнано в плен, а статуя Бога-Императора сильно повреждена.
languages.translation_comment: игрок не демонпринц и уралон не компаньон

languages.text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.
languages.original_text: Лишенная цели и предводителя, банда Несущие Слово отступила в глубины Имматериума. Их последним актом мести стал кровавый налет на Футфол. Население нескольких астероидов было истреблено или угнано в плен, а статуя Бога-Императора сильно повреждена.

traits.locale_text: Left without a goal and without its leader, the Word Bearers gang retreated to the depths of Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was heavily damaged.

Left without a goal and without its leader, the Word Bearers gang retreated to the depths of Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was heavily damaged.

Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

languages.text: 怀言者失去了领袖与使命，撤退到了亚空间的深处。他们最后发起了一次复仇行动，对落脚港进行了血腥袭击。多个小行星上的居民遭到灭绝或奴役，神皇的雕像也被严重损坏。
languages.original_text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

traits.locale_text: 怀言者失去了领袖与使命，撤退到了亚空间的深处。他们最后发起了一次复仇行动，对落脚港进行了血腥袭击。多个小行星上的居民遭到灭绝或奴役，神皇的雕像也被严重损坏。

languages.text: Die Word Bearers hatten keine Mission und keinen Anführer mehr und zogen sich in die Tiefen des Immateriums zurück. Ihr letzter Racheakt war ein blutiger Angriff auf Footfall. Die Bevölkerung mehrerer Asteroiden wurde ausgelöscht oder versklavt, und die Statue des Gottimperators wurde schwer beschädigt.
languages.original_text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

traits.locale_text: Die Word Bearers hatten keine Mission und keinen Anführer mehr und zogen sich in die Tiefen des Immateriums zurück. Ihr letzter Racheakt war ein blutiger Angriff auf Footfall. Die Bevölkerung mehrerer Asteroiden wurde ausgelöscht oder versklavt, und die Statue des Gottimperators wurde schwer beschädigt.

languages.text: Désormais sans mission ni chef, les Word Bearers se retirèrent dans les profondeurs de l'Immaterium. En guise de dernière vengeance, ils lancèrent un assaut sanglant sur Castel. Les habitants de plusieurs astéroïdes furent exterminés ou réduits en esclavage, tandis que la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu fut considérablement endommagée.
languages.original_text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

traits.locale_text: Désormais sans mission ni chef, les Word Bearers se retirèrent dans les profondeurs de l'Immaterium. En guise de dernière vengeance, ils lancèrent un assaut sanglant sur Castel. Les habitants de plusieurs astéroïdes furent exterminés ou réduits en esclavage, tandis que la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu fut considérablement endommagée.

languages.text: Sin misión ni líder, los Portadores de la Palabra se retiraron a las profundidades del Inmaterio. Su último acto de venganza fue un asalto sangriento contra Paso. La población de varios asteroides acabó exterminada o esclavizada y la estatua del Dios Emperador sufrió graves daños.
languages.original_text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

traits.locale_text: Sin misión ni líder, los Portadores de la Palabra se retiraron a las profundidades del Inmaterio. Su último acto de venganza fue un asalto sangriento contra Paso. La población de varios asteroides acabó exterminada o esclavizada y la estatua del Dios Emperador sufrió graves daños.

languages.text: 任務もリーダーも失ったワードベアラーは、非物質世界の深部へと退却した。彼らの最後の復讐は、フットフォールへの血なまぐさい襲撃だった。いくつかの小惑星の住民は絶滅させられたか奴隷にされ、神帝陛下の像はひどく損傷した。
languages.original_text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

traits.locale_text: 任務もリーダーも失ったワードベアラーは、非物質世界の深部へと退却した。彼らの最後の復讐は、フットフォールへの血なまぐさい襲撃だった。いくつかの小惑星の住民は絶滅させられたか奴隷にされ、神帝陛下の像はひどく損傷した。

languages.text: Misyonsuz ve lidersiz kalan Vahyedenler, Tindiyar'ın derinliklerine geri çekildiler. İntikam amacıyla yaptıkları son eylem, kanlı bir Binliman saldırısıydı. Birkaç asteroitte yaşayan nüfus ya yok edildi ya da köleleştirildi, Tanrı İmparator'un heykeli ise ağır hasar aldı.
languages.original_text: Left without a mission or a leader, the Word Bearers retreated to the depths of the Immaterium. Their last act of vengeance was a bloody assault on Footfall. The populace of several asteroids was exterminated or enslaved, and the statue of the God-Emperor was badly damaged.

traits.locale_text: Misyonsuz ve lidersiz kalan Vahyedenler, Tindiyar'ın derinliklerine geri çekildiler. İntikam amacıyla yaptıkları son eylem, kanlı bir Binliman saldırısıydı. Birkaç asteroitte yaşayan nüfus ya yok edildi ya da köleleştirildi, Tanrı İmparator'un heykeli ise ağır hasar aldı.

languages.translation_comment: игрок не демонпринц и уралон не компаньон
